name: Remind101 Widget
author: Matt Young

sections.description: Include a widget of recent from a remind101 account.
sections.installation:
1. upload to your wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in wordpress
  3. Move the widget where you want in in the Appearance -> Widgets Menu
  4. Input your token from remind101.com. To find your token, login to your account at remind101.com, click on Account then My Widget. Your key is the string of letters and numbers after token= up to but not including the quotation marks.
sections.faq:
Where do I find my remind101 token

Login to your account at remind101.com, click on Account then My Widget. Your key is the string of letters and numbers after token= up to but not including the quotation marks.

short_description: Include a widget of recent from a remind101 account.
description: Include a widget of recent from a remind101 account.
